series.title: You
series.description: You is an American psychological thriller television series developed by Greg Berlanti and Sera Gamble.

series.title: Black Mirror
series.description: Black Mirror is a British dystopian science fiction anthology television series created by Charlie Brooker.

series.title: The Haunting of Hill House
series.description: The Haunting of Hill House is an American supernatural horror drama television series created and directed by Mike Flanagan, and serves as the first entry in The Haunting anthology series.

series.title: Dynasty
series.description: Dynasty is an American prime time television soap opera based on the 1980s series of the same name.

series.title: Gossip Girl
series.description: Gossip Girl is an American teen drama television series based on the novel series of the same name written by Cecily von Ziegesar.

series.title: Elite
series.description: Elite is a Spanish thriller teen drama streaming television series created for Netflix by Carlos Montero and Dar√≠o Madrona.

series.title: The Originals
series.description: The Originals is an American fantasy supernatural drama television series that began airing on The CW on October 3, 2013.

series.title: The Vampire Diaries
series.description: The Vampire Diaries is an American supernatural teen drama television series developed by Kevin Williamson and Julie Plec, based on the popular book series of the same name written by L. J. Smith.

series.title: Sherlock
series.description: Sherlock is a British crime television series based on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's Sherlock Holmes detective stories.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: Breaking Bad is an American neo-Western crime drama television series created and produced by Vince Gilligan.
